patthana1.3:151.1: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ sampayutto sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—

patthana1.3:157.1: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.3:157.2: sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana1.3:157.3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #1

patthana1.3:158.2: dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.3:159.1: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.3:159.2: adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana1.3:159.3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.3:161.1: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.3:161.2: sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttena cittena dānaṃ datvā, sīlaṃ samādiyitvā, uposathakammaṃ katvā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttena cittena paccavekkhati.
patthana1.3:161.3: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā, maggā vuṭṭhahitvā, phalā vuṭṭhahitvā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttena cittena paccavekkhati.
patthana1.3:161.4: Ariyā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttena cittena sukhāya vedanāya sampayutte pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti.
patthana1.3:161.5: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayutte khandhe sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttena cittena aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, assādeti abhinandati;
patthana1.3:161.6: taṃ ārabbha sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati;
patthana1.3:161.7: sukhāya vedanāya sampayutte khandhe ārabbha sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā khandhā uppajjanti. #1
patthana1.3:162.1: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.3:162.2: sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttena cittena dānaṃ datvā, sīlaṃ samādiyitvā, uposathakammaṃ katvā vippaṭisārissa domanassaṃ uppajjati.
patthana1.3:162.3: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayutte jhāne parihīne vippaṭisārissa domanassaṃ uppajjati.
patthana1.3:162.4: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayutte khandhe ārabbha dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttā khandhā uppajjanti. #2

patthana1.3:163.3: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā, maggā vuṭṭhahitvā, phalā vuṭṭhahitvā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttena cittena paccavekkhati.
patthana1.3:163.4: Ariyā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttena cittena sukhāya vedanāya sampayutte pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti.
patthana1.3:163.5: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayutte khandhe adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttena cittena aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, assādeti abhinandati;

patthana1.3:163.7: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammupagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.3:163.8: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayutte khandhe ārabbha adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā khandhā uppajjanti. #3

patthana1.3:379.1: Noavigatapaccayā nahetupaccayā naārammaṇapaccayā anantare satta, samanantare satta, upanissaye nava, āsevane tīṇi, kamme aṭṭha, natthiyā satta, vigate satta … pe ….
patthana1.3:381.1: Noavigatapaccayā nahetupaccayā naārammaṇa naadhipati naanantara nasamanantara nasahajāta naaññamañña nanissaya naupanissaya napurejāta napacchājāta naāsevana navipāka naāhāra naindriya najhāna namagga nasampayutta navippayutta noatthipaccayā nonatthipaccayā novigatapaccayā kamme aṭṭha.
patthana1.3:383.1: Noavigatapaccayā nahetupaccayā … pe … nanissayapaccayā napurejātapaccayā … pe … nakammapaccayā … pe … novigatapaccayā upanissaye nava.
patthana1.3:384.1: Yathā kusalattikassa paccanīyānulomagaṇanā sajjhāyamaggena gaṇitā, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.
